sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function Solutions() { return (

Solutions

Demand forecasting

Demand forecasts are generated for different product lines and items using generative, causal and time series techniques. The demand estimates are fed into the daily, weekly and monthly planning processes.

Reverse logistics

Leverages ML along side customizable business logic to understand demand for each returned unit and route it to profitable channel.

Pricing & revenue management

Distribute products across channels to maximize revenue and profit by considering the channel level demands and liquidate excess and obsolete inventory at the right price.

) } export default Solutions
